Well we do not have any Mac here to test, so you can do a few things:

- send us a Patch to fix this
- attach an executable that shows the problem
  and someone could look at it.

Created an attachment (id=24119)
fix for macho parser

The problem was the MachO parser was not detecting load commands for weak
linking.  This patch adds the missing command type and a fallback case to
prevent null values from happening again.
Alain, would you mind applying this patch. merci

Applied to the head.
Please verify
